item.title: LeetCode
item.description: LeetCode 解题记录 709 To Lower Case Implement function ToLowerCase() that has a string parameter str, and returns the same string in lowercase. chars[i] += 'a' - 'A'; 771 Jewels and Stones You’re given strings J representing the types of stones that are jewels, and S representing the stones you have. Each character in S is a type of stone you have. You want to know how many of the stones you have are also jewels.

item.title: Git Memo
item.description: HUGO Add some content hugo new posts/xxx.md Start the Hugo Server # 重新生成静态blog # -t 主题 hugo -t=hyde -D 上传到orrrz.github.io cd public git init git add . git commit -m 'xxx' git remote add origin git@github.com:username/username.github.io.git git push -u origin master # --force 一键部署 # 在根目录新建 deploy.sh ，复制以下代码并保存 #!/bin/bash echo -e "\033[0;32mDeploying updates to GitHub...\033[0m" msg="rebuilding site `date`" if [ $# -eq 1 ] then msg="$1" fi # 修改为自己的theme hugo -t=theme -D cd public git add -A git commit -m "$msg" git push --force -u origin master cd .

item.title: Some Sentences
item.description: ‘I wish you all enough courage to be yourselves without need for approval or permission from anyone…’ ‘I wish you enough humility to stop thinking you are better than anyone… ‘
